descriptionHtml:
This is just a recolor and added graphics to give male
nightingales a dark reaper look.
* that's right, only edited for male chars.

This will not likely work if you have other mod's installed involving nightingale armor. this is just a texture replacement mod that will more than likely get overridden by .esp mods, at least in my experience.

You may find that the mask works on female characters,
but to be honest, i am not sure.

add Data folder to:
Program Files (x86)> Steam> steamapps> common> Skyrim

Sorry about the mix-up, I went through the files and corrected my goof-ups. I'm new to this stuff
Please re-download the new files and try it out!

To answer some questions:

If I get time:
-Will try to get some standalone stuff to work, I am not familiar with .esp's though so I can't promise anything.
-May also get around to removing the logo on back of cape, but only if i get more requests for that (just took me long enough to get to this point haha)
author: Daredevildan
